ARABIC: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَٰبِ مَرْيَمَ إِذِ ٱنتَبَذَتْ مِنْ أَهْلِهَا مَكَانًا شَرْقِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Mention Maryam in the Book, how she withdrew from her people to an eastern place,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Commemorate Mary in the Book. When she withdrew from her family to a place in the East
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Muhammad), recite in the Book the account of Mary, when she withdrew from her people to a place towards the east;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), mention in the Book (the Quran) the story of Mary how she left her family and started living in a solitary place to the East
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And remember Maryam in the Book; when she went away from her family to a place towards east.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And mention in the Book, Maryam, when she withdrew in seclusion from her family to place facing east.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And mention Marium in the Book when she drew aside from her family to an eastern place;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And mention in the Book Mary when she withdrew from her people to an eastern place,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And make mention of Mary in the Scripture, when she had withdrawn from her people to a chamber looking East,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Recount in the Book how Mary withdrew from her people to an eastern place
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And mention thou in the Book Maryam, what time the retired from her people to a place eastward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And mention in the Book Mary, when she withdrew from her family to an easterly place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Relate in the Book (the story of) Mary, when she withdrew from her family to a place in the East.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And mention in the Book (the Quran, O Muhammad SAW, the story of) Maryam (Mary), when she withdrew in seclusion from her family to a place facing east.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And mention in the Book, Mary, how she withdrew from her people to an eastern place and she took a veil apart from them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And mention in the Scripture Mary, when she withdrew from her people to an eastern location.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And mention, [O Muhammad], in the Book [the story of] Mary, when she withdrew from her family to a place toward the east.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:16] And mention in the Book, [in] the Qur’ān, Mary, that is, [mention] her tale, when she withdrew from her family to an easterly place, that is, [when] she secluded herself in a place on the east side of [her] home.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And make mention) Muhammad (of Mary) of the event of Mary (in the Scripture) in the Qur'an, (when she had withdrawn from her people to a chamber looking East) east of their house,
